pullrequest.title: [gz11] Add missing component to error message

content.raw:
humm the parenthesis looks bad if there's more than one component:

~~~
-- BUILD ERRORS: These must be resolved before compiling.
--      Missing: ignition-physics1 (sdf
--      dartsim
--      dartsim-plugin)
-- END BUILD ERRORS
~~~

I tried the following to put all components in a single string:

~~~
diff -r cadabe23cd55 cmake/IgnUtils.cmake
--- a/cmake/IgnUtils.cmake      Tue Oct 02 15:39:32 2018 -0700
+++ b/cmake/IgnUtils.cmake      Tue Oct 02 16:31:18 2018 -0700
@@ -200,7 +200,8 @@
     set(${PACKAGE_NAME}_msg "Missing: ${${PACKAGE_NAME}_pretty}")
 
     if(ign_find_package_COMPONENTS)
-      set(${PACKAGE_NAME}_msg "${${PACKAGE_NAME}_msg} (${ign_find_package_COMPONENTS})")
+      ign_list_to_string(comp_str ${ign_find_package_COMPONENTS})
+      set(${PACKAGE_NAME}_msg "${${PACKAGE_NAME}_msg} (${comp_str})")
     endif()
 
     if(DEFINED ign_find_package_PURPOSE)
~~~

But the result was the following:

~~~
-- BUILD ERRORS: These must be resolved before compiling.
--      Missing: ignition-physics1 ( sdf)
-- END BUILD ERRORS
~~~

If someone knows a nice way of handling this, please let me know. Otherwise I can revisit later.
content.html:
humm the parenthesis looks bad if there's more than one component:

-- BUILD ERRORS: These must be resolved before compiling.
--      Missing: ignition-physics1 (sdf
--      dartsim
--      dartsim-plugin)
-- END BUILD ERRORS

I tried the following to put all components in a single string:

diff -r cadabe23cd55 cmake/IgnUtils.cmake
--- a/cmake/IgnUtils.cmake      Tue Oct 02 15:39:32 2018 -0700
+++ b/cmake/IgnUtils.cmake      Tue Oct 02 16:31:18 2018 -0700
@@ -200,7 +200,8 @@
     set(${PACKAGE_NAME}_msg "Missing: ${${PACKAGE_NAME}_pretty}")

     if(ign_find_package_COMPONENTS)
-      set(${PACKAGE_NAME}_msg "${${PACKAGE_NAME}_msg} (${ign_find_package_COMPONENTS})")
+      ign_list_to_string(comp_str ${ign_find_package_COMPONENTS})
+      set(${PACKAGE_NAME}_msg "${${PACKAGE_NAME}_msg} (${comp_str})")
     endif()

     if(DEFINED ign_find_package_PURPOSE)

But the result was the following:

-- BUILD ERRORS: These must be resolved before compiling.
--      Missing: ignition-physics1 ( sdf)
-- END BUILD ERRORS

If someone knows a nice way of handling this, please let me know. Otherwise I can revisit later.
